requestComponent(Class) - Static method in class com.rectgdx.SpriteManager
Returns a Component of given type from object pooling (must be wiped manually)
requestKeptObject(Class) - Static method in class com.rectgdx.SpriteManager
Returns a Object of given type from object pooling (is repooled after every frame)
For Component use SpriteManager.requestComponent(Class)
Automatically keeps the sprite with SpriteManager.keep(Object)

Uses Vector2.set(float, float) to set values
requestObject(Class) - Static method in class com.rectgdx.SpriteManager
Returns a Object of given type from object pooling (is repooled after every frame)
For Component use SpriteManager.requestComponent(Class)
To avoid being wiped by SpriteManager.refreshObjectPooling() use SpriteManager.keep(Object)

reset() - Method in class com.rectgdx.RectSprite

Is called when requesting a new RectSprite using SpriteManager.requestRectSprite()
